com.android.internal.policy.impl.keyguard

Interface KeyguardSecurityCallback


  • public interface KeyguardSecurityCallback

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dismiss(boolean securityVerified)
      Dismiss the given security screen.
      int getFailedAttempts()
      Gets the number of attempts thus far as reported by reportFailedUnlockAttempt()
      boolean isVerifyUnlockOnly()
      Checks if keyguard is in "verify credentials" mode.
      void reportFailedUnlockAttempt()
      Call when the user incorrectly enters their credentials
      void reportSuccessfulUnlockAttempt()
      Call when user correctly enters their credentials
      void setOnDismissAction(com.android.internal.policy.impl.keyguard.KeyguardHostView.OnDismissAction action)
      Sets an action to perform after the user successfully enters their credentials.
      void showBackupSecurity()
      Shows the backup security for the current method.
      void userActivity(long timeout)
      Manually report user activity to keep the device awake.

    • Method Detail

      • dismiss

        void dismiss(boolean securityVerified)
        Dismiss the given security screen.
        Parameters:
        securityVerified - true if the user correctly entered credentials for the given screen.

      • userActivity

        void userActivity(long timeout)
        Manually report user activity to keep the device awake. If timeout is 0, uses user-defined timeout.
        Parameters:
        timeout -

      • isVerifyUnlockOnly

        boolean isVerifyUnlockOnly()
        Checks if keyguard is in "verify credentials" mode.
        Returns:
        true if user has been asked to verify security.

      • reportSuccessfulUnlockAttempt

        void reportSuccessfulUnlockAttempt()
        Call when user correctly enters their credentials

      • reportFailedUnlockAttempt

        void reportFailedUnlockAttempt()
        Call when the user incorrectly enters their credentials

      • getFailedAttempts

        int getFailedAttempts()
        Gets the number of attempts thus far as reported by reportFailedUnlockAttempt()
        Returns:
        number of failed attempts

      • showBackupSecurity

        void showBackupSecurity()
        Shows the backup security for the current method. If none available, this call is a no-op.

      • setOnDismissAction

        void setOnDismissAction(com.android.internal.policy.impl.keyguard.KeyguardHostView.OnDismissAction action)
        Sets an action to perform after the user successfully enters their credentials.
        Parameters:
        action -
